name: PearedUp
overview: PearedUp is a social networking site designed to change the way we build relationships. Until now, all communication required that one person makes the first move without knowing how the other person will respond. PearedUp eliminates the guesswork by allowing people to select who they are most interested in having a relationship with, be it as friends, more than friends or even business associates. You are then only connected with individuals who also select you on their lists. Simply create a list of the people you are interested in getting PearedUp with. Then, if you are on their list, weâ€™ll notify you both of a match. If no match is made, the other person will not know that you selected them. No risk; only the reward of a meaningful relationship.
